name: Friendship Bracelet
description: Causes certain pokémon to evolve when leveled up.

name: Mega Evolution
description: Transforms your pokémon into its mega form!

name: X Mega Evolution
description: Transforms your pokémon into its X mega form!

name: Y Mega Evolution
description: Transforms your pokémon into its Y mega form!

name: Redeem
description: Spawns any catchable pokémon of your choice.

name: Incense
description: Spawns a pokémon every 20 seconds for an hour.

name: Shiny Charm
description: Increases your shiny rate by 20% for 1 week.
